BagIt-Profile-Info.External-Description: BagIt profile for Research Objects. The main requirements are the presense of an RO-Crate Metadata file, see https://w3id.org/ro/crate/ https://www.researchobject.org/ro-crate/1.1/appendix/implementation-notes.html#combining-with-other-packaging-schemes https://w3id.org/ro/bagit

Bag-Size.description: Human-readable approximate size of the bag being transferred, e.g. 1.4 GB

Payload-Oxum.description: The octetstream sum of the payload according to https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc8493#section-2.2.2

External-Identifier.description: Recommended to be a UUID URN (RFC4122) to uniquely identify this archive, e.g. urn:uuid:24e51ca2-5067-4598-935a-dac4e327d05a -- see https://www.researchobject.org/ro-crate/1.1/appendix/implementation-notes.html#base-uri-in-bagit https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/draft-soilandreyes-arcp-03#appendix-A.4
